column4: how do i make my file folder show a thumnail inside eg. i have a movie it has a cover its stored in a folder under videos called hero, cna that folder show the picture of hero as it does in windows?
you mean a video thumbnail or a thumbnail of the cover picture?
a thumbnail of the cover picture
if you're looking at the folder in Icon view you should see thumbnails by default unless you've messed with some settings
i havent messed with any setting AFAIK but going over them would be a great idea since i am really new to this
so you don't see any thumbnail?
i just went under my music folder and went to view/reset viw to default
go to options and see if you can find anything there
how about preferences since there is no options?
no love i change 2 items /preview/show thumbnails -- always /preview/only for files smaller than --1GB
what about /preferences/tree view defaults/show only folders --checked
I don't see why that would help
